name: Three-rannosaurus Rex
description:
Made for Lucas for his 3rd birthday ever.
Hop and jump over as many cupcakes, party hats, and birthday cakes as possible

Hold SPACE to charge. Release to jump!

CREDITS:
Game, Art, and Programming
Nathaniel Perry

Title and Main Themes
Magic_Spark

Game Over Jingle
'Not So Super After All, It Seems', by Solomon Allen

Game Sound FX by OwlishMedia
